content: सदृक्ष (क्षी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) सदृश्, सदृश {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (शी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Like, resembling, similar, of the same rank, (with <ab>gen.</ab> or <ab>loc.</ab>, but usually in comp); वज्रपातसदृश, कुसुमसदृश &c. {@--2@} Fit, right, suitable, conformable; as in प्रस्तावसदृशं वाक्यं <ls>H. 2. 51.</ls> {@--3@} Worthy, befitting, becoming; श्रुतस्य किं तत्सदृशं कुलस्य <ls>R. 14. 61</ls>, <ls n="R.">1. 15.</ls>
